name: Go Kart Racing Cup 3D
description:
You have to go as fast as you can while following the given course and win the race!

There are 12 races and three different cups: Bronze, Silver and Gold. Win races and get all cups!

Challenge yourself and your friend with addictive cool go kart racing game.

Suitable for children and all ages. Enjoy it on iPhone, iPad and iPod touch.

Have fun !
